page.title: 16Games Played in Gt.Broughton
page.content:
{Block 1.2.3.
Block 1.2.3. is a game that you play with about 5 people.One counts to 100 and the others hide.The person counting has a blocking place which the others have to get to while the counter is somewhere else.If they do they get freedom and are not on.The counter catches you by getting to the post before you and saying "Block 1.2.3".The first to be caught is on. This is the most popular game.
{Ball games.
One of the games is tennis. You need a raquet,a ball and two people. You hit the ball to each other over a net. You try to keep the ball going. This is another popular game.
